interactive.translation[0].definitions[0: an interactive computer program, television system etc allows you to communicate directly with it, and does things in reaction to your actions
interactive.translation[0].definitions[1: interactive teaching methods such as role playing
interactive.translation[1].definitions[0: interactive television, computer software etc allows the person using it to affect what happens on the screen
technology that will let people play the lottery via the internet, mobile phones and interactive television
a world-wide publisher of interactive entertainment software.
